text: Hi, Im having trouble creating a new deal using the deal api and adding deal info properties to the request too? Any help much appreciated.

Hi all.

Is it possible to get details on the Payment Schedule via the Quotes API? To retrieve and create a quote with a breakdown of payments?

Thanks!
Strongly recommend you avoid storing auth data on the client side, if that’s what this is. Bit confused on what you’re trying to do in this snippet, and why.
Hey all for owners api is it firstName or first_name because the docs are wrong :smile:
I’m seeing this has the response in the Owner’s API.
Yea it’s weird, in workflow custom coded action using the api call we tried that and it failed. Then we pulled the dir and first_name is what came up and worked.
Are you using the HubSpot-api-client or axios request?
Replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual HubSpot API Key. Modify the `dealname` and `amount` properties to match the desired deal information properties you want to set.

I can offer some general suggestions to help you troubleshoot the problem.
• Verify API Permissions
• Check Deal Properties
• Review Attribution Settings

You can manually set up and manage the Payment Schedule within the HubSpot Quotes tool itself. The Payment Schedule allows you to define the payment terms and breakdown for a quote, specifying when and how payments should be made.
